text:
I am using 

xinidice 1.1b

with java version:

java version "1.3.1"
Java(TM) 2 Runtime Environment, Standard Edition (build 1.3.1)
Classic VM (build 1.3.1, J2RE 1.3.1 IBM build cxia32131-20021102 (JIT enabled: 
jitc))

and xinidice uses  the following JDK 1.4.1 complient methode: 

stackTrace: java.lang.reflect.InvocationTar
getException: java.lang.NoSuchMethodError: java.lang.StringBuffer: method append
(Ljava/lang/StringBuffer;)Ljava/lang/StringBuffer; not found 

Is it possible to make Xinidice compliant to the SUN speck for JDK 1.3.1 ?
creator: tboehm@de.ibm.com
